short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A free, full-featured podcast player with seamless device synchronization, episode downloads, offline mode and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- Explore over 4 million shows
 - Organize your podcasts in customizable playlists
 - Sync between unlimited devices
 - Download podcasts and listen to them offline
 - Import your own custom podcast feeds
 - Import shows from other podcast players
 - Leave comments on podcasts' timelines
 - Accessible from anywhere via cozy.fm
 - Playback speed, sleep timer, continuous playback even when closed
 - Works with your operating system's global audio controls
 - Privacy friendly
 - No account required
 - No excessive extension permissions
 - No data collection except for account/login purposes
 - No Cookies
 - Just podcasts

Thanks for joining our little podcast community :)
